name: Child Protection Hotline
description: Kentucky Child and Adult Protective Services hotline for reporting abuse, neglect, and exploitation. 24-hour emergency hotline operated by the Kentucky Cabinet for Health and Family Services. Accepts reports of child abuse, neglect, dependency, and adult abuse/neglect. Provides immediate response for emergency situations and coordinates with local law enforcement and social services agencies.
source: Verified from official Kentucky government websites and cross-referenced with multiple sources
notes: Verified information from official Kentucky Cabinet for Health and Family Services website (https://www.chfs.ky.gov/agencies/dcbs/dpp/cpb/Pages/default.aspx) and Child/Adult Protective Services Reporting System (https://prd.webapps.chfs.ky.gov/reportabuse/home.aspx). Alternative numbers: (877) KYSAFE1, (800) 752-6200. Online reporting available Monday-Friday 8:00 AM-4:30 PM ET at https://prd.webapps.chfs.ky.gov/reportabuse/home.aspx. For emergencies, call 911. Branch Manager: William Eric Smith, MSSW. Part of the Department for Community Based Services, Division of Protection and Permanency.
